parameter.name: Hue
parameter.description: Takes a value in degrees (-180 to 180).

parameter.name: Saturation
parameter.description: Takes a decimal value (0-1). eg: 0.5 = set saturation to 50% of original saturation)

parameter.name: Lightness
parameter.description: Takes a decimal value (0-1). eg. 0.5 = increase lightness by 50% of original lightness
